[Home](./index.md) &gt; [config](./config.md) &gt; [PluginConfigs](./config.pluginconfigs.md) &gt; [importMap](./config.pluginconfigs.importmap.md)

## PluginConfigs.importMap property

Use import map as the transform rules. (This has the highest priority.)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
importMap?: ImportMapResolution | ImportMapCustomResolution
```

## Remarks

\*\*Experimental\*\* may have many bugs on transforming with importMap. See [ImportMapResolution](./config.importmapresolution.md) (static) or [ImportMapCustomResolution](./config.importmapcustomresolution.md) (dynamic)

## Example

Folder:

```shell
/web_modules/ # where node_module lives
/src/ # your source code
/dist/ # your output
tsconfig.json # tsconfig at here
```
You must set `rootDir` when using importMap.

Filename: `import-map/tsconfig.json`

```json
{
    "compilerOptions": {
        "plugins": [
            {
                // @magic-works/ttypescript-browser-like-import-transformer
                "transform": "@magic-works/ttypescript-browser-like-import-transformer",
                "after": true,
                "importMap": {
                    "type": "path",
                    "mapPath": "./web_modules/import-map.json",
                    "simulateRuntimeImportMapPosition": "/web_modules/",
                    "simulateRuntimeSourceRoot": "/dist/"
                }
            }
        ],
        "target": "ESNext",
        "module": "ESNext",
        "outDir": "./dist",
        "rootDir": "./src",
        "moduleResolution": "node"
    }
}
```
Source:

Filename: `import-map/src/index.ts`

```ts
// @ts-ignore
import * as _ from 'lodash-es'
console.log(_)
import './another'
```
Output:

Filename: `import-map/index.js`

```js
// @ts-ignore
import * as _ from "/web_modules/lodash-es.js?rev=806d1b9f78";
console.log(_);
import "./another.js";
```
